mapper.select: select m.chart_date,c.collabo_no,c.chart_progress,c.chart_total_date,c.chart_seq from CHART_DATA c join (select max(chart_date)as chart_date,collabo_no from chart_data group by collabo_no)m on c.chart_date=m.chart_date where c.collabo_no=m.collabo_no
select chart_date,collabo_no,chart_progress,chart_total_date,chart_seq from chart_data where collabo_no=#{collabo_no} order by chart_date
